description:
17 years old. Gai`s twin sister. Just like her brother, she`s good at sports and gets excellent grades. Strong on the outside, inside she is dependent on her brother, and follows him everywhere. Just like her brother, she`s aggravated by Daisuke`s overprotective nature, and keeps her distance from him. The only member of the team who doesn`t remember Milo`s prophecy.
Source: Official page
name: Chang Lu Steiner
